result.eng: They are planning a new system.
result.ga: tá córas nua á bheartú acu
result.orig: tá córas nua á bheartú acu
result.html: tá córas nua á bheartú acuThey are planning a new system.
result.ponchtml: tá córas nua á ḃeartú acuThey are planning a new system.

result.eng: I am planning to return to university.
result.ga: tá sé beartaithe agam filleadh ar an ollscoil
result.orig: tá sé beartaithe agam filleadh ar an ollscoil
result.html: tá sé beartaithe agam filleadh ar an ollscoilI am planning to return to university.
result.ponchtml: tá sé beartaiṫe agam filleaḋ ar an ollscoilI am planning to return to university.

result.eng: We are planning to launch the product soon.
result.ga: tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a sheoladh go luath
result.orig: tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a sheoladh go luath
result.html: tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a sheoladh go luathWe are planning to launch the product soon.
result.ponchtml: tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a ẛeolaḋ go luaṫWe are planning to launch the product soon.

result.eng: Central to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ga: lárnach sa phleanáil bhí mohammad atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa ghearmáin
result.orig: lárnach sa phleanáil bhí mohammad atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa ghearmáin
result.html: lárnach sa phleanáil bhí mohammad atta Éigipteach a chuaigh le hantoisceachas ioslamach agus é ina mhac léinn sa ghearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.
result.ponchtml: lárnaċ sa ṗleanáil ḃí mohammad atta Éigipteaċ a ċuaiġ le hantoisceaċas ioslamaċ agus é ina ṁac léinn sa ġearmáinCentral to the planning was Mohammad Atta, an Egyptian who had devoted himself to Islamic extremism as a student in Germany.

result.eng: Clearly, the United States of America were planning a big revenge.
